name: Itty Grav
description:
In Ittygrav, your character's gravity can reorient if you walk up or down a ramp, while the rest of the world stays still. Use this unique ability to find your path to the goal.

Controls:

  • Move - WASD or Arrows
  • Jump - Space Bar
  • Menu - Esc (use ScrollWheel to find levels)

Credits:

Peter DeVries - Game Design, Level Design, and Art

Mark DeGonia - Music and Sound Design

Thomas Landry - Senior Assistant to the Head of Primary Post Initial Programming

John Morris - Programming Lead
